spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 379 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: While you have one or more Bone Shield charges, the damage you take is reduced by 2.0%. Losing a Bone Shield charge has a chance to reduce the damage you take by an additional 1.0%, up to 3.0% for 6 sec.
Set: Your damage is increased by 0.5% per active Bone Shield charge. Taking damage while below 6 Bone Shield charges has a chance to generate 1-2 Bone Shield charges.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Receive cryptic instructions from somewhere in the Twisting Nether to reveal your next task. It's probably nothing, so complete it to gain 14,522 Strength for 15 sec.  (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Engrave a ritual seal into your skin binding you to the shadows, granting yourself 3,412 Strength.

Your spells and abilities have a low chance to reduce one of your secondary stats by 3,643 for 10 sec during combat.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
